titles.title: To amend the Tariff Act of 1930 to require that certain laminated woven bags be marked with the country of origin.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
7/31/2008--Introduced.
Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to require that certain laminated woven bags be marked with the country of origin.
